title: 7: S2E07 – "Fearsome Findings” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales by authors Jimmy Juliano, Moonlit Cove, M4Z3, and an anonymous author, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about following phantasms, criminal incompetence, twisted takes on urban legends, and the nightmarish side of nature. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s2e06
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
